title: Hunt your Dream House
description: This project is a dynamic and versatile real estate platform that empowers seekers to find their perfect homes for rent or purchase.

title: Tic-tac-Toe
description: Tic-Tac-Toe is a two-player game in which the players fill up nine empty rectangles in a table with either an X or an O when it is their turn.

title: Rock-Paper-Scissors
description: This Project will generate a random choice for the computer and then prompt the player to enter their choice and dispaly the winner.

title: HAR
description: Human activity recognition (HAR) is the process of identifying and naming activities from data collected from devices. HAR uses ML or DL networks to classify a person's actions from a series of measurements.

title: Birds Audio Classification
description: Birds classification based on audio using ML and DL techniques can be very helpful to find some rare birds as it will tell the species of the bird before actually tracking it and this can save a lot of time and efforts.

title: Wine Quality Check
description: Wine Quality Check ML Project aims to provide an objective measure of wine quality that helps stakeholders differentiate between wines that meet high-quality standards and those that fall below expectations.
